document_data.mainbody:
ennis was a tasked winemaker genie who served the Brotherhood of the True Flame in the fortress of Krak al-Niraan in 1367 DR.
When he wasnt lounging in a drunken stupor, Fennis spent his time harvesting grapes and making wine for the keep. Fennis was assisted by a trio of copper automatons in his work.
Fennis had three potions of plant control that he kept hidden within an empty wine urn.
